title: Unrelated Image Falsely Shown as Indian Army Casualties in Galwan
subtitle: Fact Check of Indian Army Casualties in Galwan Image: An old picture of bodies of soldiers is being falsely shared as an image of Indian army soldiers who died in the violent face-off  at the Galwan Valley on 15 June.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
An old picture of bodies of soldiers is being falsely shared as an image of Indian Army soldiers who died in the violent face-off that took place between the troops of India and China at the Galwan Valley on 15 June.

While the exact origin of the image could not be ascertained, we found that the same image was published in a blog and an article in 2015.
